00025 class cAnimFrameData {
00026         public:
00027                 BITMAP *bmp;
00028                 
00029                 int xo,yo; // Offset for this bitmap
00030                 
00032                 double t;
00033 };
00034 
00036 class cAnimSeqData {
00037         public:
00039                 std::vector<class cAnimFrameData *>fd;
00040                 
00041                 double maxt; // Cumulative length of sequence in seconds
00042                 std::string next;
00043                 
00044                 int id; // Numerical ID for this sequence
00045                 
00047                 cAnimFrameData *new_frame(BITMAP *bmp, int xof, int yof, double tm) {
00048                     cAnimFrameData *tmp = new cAnimFrameData;
00049                     
00050                     // Setting frame data
00051                     tmp->bmp = bmp;
00052                     tmp->xo = xof;
00053                     tmp->yo = yof;
00054                     tmp->t = tm;
00055                     maxt+=tm;
00056                     
00057                     fd.push_back(tmp);
00058                     return tmp;
00059                 }
00060 };
00061 
00063 class cAnimData {
00064         public:
00066                 std::map<std::string,cAnimSeqData *>
00067                         sqd;
00068                 
00071                 std::vector<cAnimSeqData *>sqv;
00072                 
00074                 cAnimSeqData *new_sequence(std::string id, std::string next="") {
00075                     cAnimSeqData *tmp = new cAnimSeqData;   // Allocating memory
00076                     sqd[id] = tmp;                          // Pushing it into the sequence map
00077                     
00078                     tmp->id = sqv.size();                   // Gets the sequence ID
00079                     sqv.push_back(tmp);                     // Pushing it into the sequence vector
00080                     
00081                     tmp->next = next;                       // Defining the "next" frame for the sequence
00082                     tmp->maxt = 0.0;                        // Zero as it has no frames
00083                     return tmp;                             // Returning the allocated sequence pointer
00084                 }
00085 };
